headline: Assessing Arista Networks (ANET) Valuation As AI Infrastructure Wins And Analyst Upgrades Support Growth
summary: Recent attention on Arista Networks (ANET) has centered on its role supplying high-speed networking gear for AI and cloud infrastructure, as investors weigh revenue and net income growth against an already well-recognized AI infrastructure story. See our latest analysis for Arista Networks. At a latest share price of US$133.60, Arista’s 30 day share price return of 3.9% comes after a 90 day share price decline of 8.1%, while its 1 year total shareholder return of 12.3% reflects a longer run...

headline: Synaptics Appoints Venkatesh (Venk) Nathamuni to Board of Directors
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., Jan. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Synaptics® Incorporated (Nasdaq: SYNA) (“Company”) today announced that on December 29, 2025, its Board of Directors (“Board”) appointed Venkatesh (Venk) Nathamuni to serve as a member of the Company’s Board and as a member of its Audit Committee, with service commencing on January 1, 2026.
